name: Underwater Treasure 3D
description:
Underwater Treasure 3D is a computer game made for the 213th Weekly Game Jam (the theme was 'Submerged'). In the game, you control a submarine and look for hidden treasure chests.

This is still an early prototype, and bugs are quite common.

See LICENSE.TXT for license info.

This software also makes use of the following libraries:

LibPNG (http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/libpng.html)

LibJPEG (http://libjpeg.sourceforge.net/)

Irrlicht (https://irrlicht.sourceforge.io/)

Made by Looki2000 & MCL

 Controls 

W - Accelerate

A - Turn left

D - Trun right

ESC - Exit the game

You can only turn left or right if your velocity is higher than zero (i.e. you're not standing still)
